channel.title: Mingfei Jin | 多模态认知智能实验室

item.title: Mingfei Jin
item.description:
Mingfei Jin is a Master candidate with research interests in large language models, reinforcement learning, and reasoning chains. His work focuses on advancing AI reasoning and learning systems.
